abstract: nasdaq rating increased to hold at bidaskclub .
article: nasdaq was upgraded by investment analysts at bidaskclub from a `` sell '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a note issued to investors on saturday . several other equities analysts have also recently commented on the company . valuengine cut nasdaq from a `` buy '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a research report on wednesday , december 20th . ubs group restated a `` buy '' rating and set a $ 89.00 target price on shares of nasdaq in a research report on monday , december 11th . barclays reduced their target price on nasdaq from $ 85.00 to $ 84.00 and set an `` overweight '' rating for the company in a research report on thursday , october 26th .

citigroup boosted their target price on nasdaq from $ 75.00 to $ 82.00 and gave the stock a `` neutral '' rating in a research report on thursday , october 19th . finally , zacks investment research upgraded nasdaq from a `` sell '' rating to a `` hold '' rating in a research report on tuesday , october 17th . one research analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating , eight have issued a hold rating and three have issued a buy rating to the company . the stock currently has an average rating of `` hold '' and a consensus price target of $ 78.67 .

nasdaq traded up $ 0.52 during trading on friday , reaching $ 79.21 . the company had a trading volume of 933,500 shares , compared to its average volume of 1,014,250 . nasdaq has a twelve month low of $ 65.98 and a twelve month high of $ 80.14 . the company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.63 , a quick ratio of 1.15 and a current ratio of 1.15 . the stock has a market capitalization of $ 13,166.79 , a pe ratio of 52.11 , a price-to-earnings-growth ratio of 2.06 and a beta of 0.79 . nasdaq last posted its earnings results on wednesday , october 25th .

the financial services provider reported $ 1.06 eps for the quarter , topping the thomson reuters ' consensus estimate of $ 1.02 by $ 0.04 . nasdaq had a return on equity of 12.69 % and a net margin of 6.72 % . the business had revenue of $ 607.00 million during the quarter , compared to analysts ' expectations of $ 599.84 million . during the same period in the previous year , the business earned $ 0.91 earnings per share . the firm 's revenue was up 3.8 % on a year-over-year basis . equities research analysts predict that nasdaq will post 4.18 eps for the current year .

in other news , insider pc nelson griggs sold 1,396 shares of the company 's stock in a transaction dated monday , november 13th . the stock was sold at an average price of $ 74.72 , for a total value of $ 104,309.12 . the transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the securities & exchange commission , which is available through this hyperlink . 1.60 % of the stock is currently owned by corporate insiders . institutional investors and hedge funds have recently bought and sold shares of the company . vanguard group inc. . lifted its stake in shares of nasdaq by 1.8 % in the 2nd quarter .

vanguard group inc. . now owns 11,470,748 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 820,043,000 after acquiring an additional 208,253 shares during the last quarter . bessemer group inc. . lifted its stake in shares of nasdaq by 2.9 % in the 3rd quarter . bessemer group inc. . now owns 2,400,450 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 186,204,000 after acquiring an additional 67,975 shares during the last quarter . jpmorgan chase & co. . lifted its stake in shares of nasdaq by 7.4 % in the 3rd quarter . jpmorgan chase & co. .

now owns 2,210,659 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 171,614,000 after acquiring an additional 151,864 shares during the last quarter . bt investment management ltd bought a new stake in shares of nasdaq in the 2nd quarter valued at about $ 97,982,000 . finally , frontier capital management co. . llc lifted its stake in shares of nasdaq by 1.3 % in the 3rd quarter . frontier capital management co. . llc now owns 1,249,927 shares of the financial services provider 's stock valued at $ 96,957,000 after acquiring an additional 16,264 shares during the last quarter .
